review: The Chromecast is a wonderful creation by Google.  It turns any TV with an HDMI port into a multi-media powerhouse.It is super easy to setup and as soon as you do, pretty much anything you can put on your Chrome browser on your computer, phone, or tablet and be cast to your TV.  Do you have a HD TV that isn't a Smart TV?  Well for about $30 the Chromecast turns your not-so-Smart TV into a very Smart TV.For you techies out there that use Plex, the Chromecast is a playback device now recognized by Plex!  No more expensive hardware as a Plex client, just get a Chromecast and Plex away!
